sentences.en: An individual applicant should be at least twenty - one ( 18 ) years.
sentences.cn: 个人会籍申请人必须为年满18岁之 个人.

sentences.en: He was the hundredth applicant for the job.
sentences.cn: 他是第100个申请这项工作的人.

sentences.en: Here's a job applicant with an excellent track record.
sentences.cn: 这里有个表现记录优良的申请者.

sentences.en: In my estimation, the applicant is well qualified for this job.
sentences.cn: 据我看, 这位应征者完全具备这项工作的条件.

sentences.en: Not every applicant had a degree.
sentences.cn: 不是所有的求职者都有学位。

sentences.en: She would interrupt the applicant and wheel across the floor on some imaginary errand.
sentences.cn: 她会打断申请者的谈话,装出有事要做的样子,坐着轮椅穿过房间.

sentences.en: The applicant sought judicial review to quash the bin - dover order.
sentences.cn: 申请人请求司法审理以便废除责令某人守法的命令.

sentences.en: The applicant sought judicial review to quash the order.
sentences.cn: 申请人寻求司法复审以撤消命令.

sentences.en: The entire metropolitan center possessed a high and mighty air calculated to overawe and abash the common applicant.
sentences.cn: 整个市中心区有着一种高傲的神气,好像故意要让一些前来寻找职业的普通人感到惶恐不安.

sentences.en: The job applicant must have good verbal skills.
sentences.cn: 应聘这份工作的人必须具有良好的语言表达技能。

sentences.en: The man imagined he saw a feverish gleam in the applicant's eye.
sentences.cn: 这个人觉得自己从这位求职者的眼睛里看到了一丝狂热的光芒.

sentences.en: The Patent Office will announce the result and notify the applicant within 18 months.
sentences.cn: 专利局会在18个月内宣布结果并公告专利.

sentences.en: This credit will only upon receipt of import licences by applicant.
sentences.cn: 本信用证仅在申请人收到进口许可证后方可生效.

sentences.en: Upon a negative decision, the applicant loses the protection offered by Belgian law.
sentences.cn: 一旦得到否定裁决，申请人就失去了比利时法律的保护。

sentences.en: We have had lots of applicants for these positions.
sentences.cn: 对这些职位我们已有了很多申请人。

sentences.en: Work with HR manager to interview and assess the applicant.
sentences.cn: 与人力资源经理共同面试、评估应聘者.

words.tran_cn: 应用；申请；应用程序；敷用

trans.tran_en: someone who has formally asked, usually in writing, for a job, university place etc
